mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(DOG_ADMISSION_DATE, 'MONTH'), 'YYYY-MM') AS admission_month, COUNT(*) AS dog_count FROM DOG WHERE DOG_ADMISSION_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH'), -3) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRUNC(DOG_ADMISSION_DATE, 'MONTH'), 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY admission_month

SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(DOG_ADOPT_DATE, 'MONTH'), 'YYYY-MM') AS adopt_month, COUNT(*) AS dog_count FROM DOG WHERE DOG_ADOPT_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH'), -3) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRUNC(DOG_ADOPT_DATE, 'MONTH'), 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY adopt_month

SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(DONATION_DATE , 'MONTH'), 'YYYY-MM') AS donation_month, SUM(DONATION_AMOUNT) AS DONATION_AMOUNT FROM DONATION_INFO WHERE DONATION_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH'), -3) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRUNC(DONATION_DATE, 'MONTH'), 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY donation_month

WITH months AS ( SELECT ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH'), LEVEL - 4) AS month_start FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 4 )
SELECT TO_CHAR(months.month_start, 'YYYY-MM') AS donation_month, NVL(SUM(td.DONATION_AMOUNT), 0) AS DONATION_AMOUNT FROM months LEFT JOIN TEST_NON_DONATION td ON months.month_start = TRUNC(td.DONATION_DATE, 'MONTH') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(months.month_start, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY donation_month
